resources.string:
What i used in this project ?
 • Programming Languages: Kotlin , Java ✔️ 
 • Operating Systems : Windows ✔️
 • Tools: Vercion Control, Android Studio ✔️
 • Presentation Layer Articuture Pattern: MVI ✔️
 • Local Layer: Room and Realm ✔️
 • Remote Layer: (Coroutine + Retrofit ) and (Fuel) ✔️
 • Cache Layer: DS as APP Mormery + WorkManager ✔️
 • DI: (Dependency Inject Fundemnatl Tech - Koin - Kodien ) ❌ 
 • Clean Architecture : true ✔️
 • Crash Analysis: [Flurry ✔️- Firebase Crash Analtics ❌ ] 
 • DataBinding : False [But use RxBinding] ❌ 
 • Dilever Updates : Siren ❌ 
 • Unit Testing : [Junit , WireMock , Mockito and Powermock] ❌ 
 • UI Testing : [Appium] ❌
